title: Loading and Playing
description: In this video series, I discuss the p5.js sound library to work with audio. In this first part, I demonstrate how to load a sound file and play it in the browser.

timestamps.title: loading a mp3 file with loadSound()
Use preload to load the sound file
Add a slider to control volume
Rate is the speed at which the song is playing
pan()  determines whether you can hear the sound in the left/right speaker

codeExamples.title: Play Song
codeExamples.description: This sketch shows how to load a sound file and play it in the browser.
